\ **æ³¨æ„ï¼š**\ å¦‚æœåœ¨ **SpriteBase3D** ä¸Šå®šä¹‰äº† :ref:`GeometryInstance3D.material_override<class_GeometryInstance3D_property_material_override>`\ ï¼Œåˆ™å¿…é¡»é…ç½®è¯¥æè´¨ï¼Œè®©å®ƒçš„åç…§ç‡è€ƒè™‘é¡¶ç‚¹é¢œè‰²ã€‚å¦åˆ™ :ref:`modulate<class_SpriteBase3D_property_modulate>` ä¸­å®šä¹‰çš„é¢œè‰²å°†è¢«å¿½ç•¥ã€‚å¯¹äº :ref:`BaseMaterial3D<class_BaseMaterial3D>`\ ï¼Œ\ :ref:`BaseMaterial3D.vertex_color_use_as_albedo<class_BaseMaterial3D_property_vertex_color_use_as_albedo>` å¿…é¡»ä¸º ``true``\ ã€‚å¯¹äº :ref:`ShaderMaterial<class_ShaderMaterial>`\ ï¼Œå¿…é¡»å°† ``ALBEDO *= COLOR.rgb;``\ ï¼Œæ’å…¥åˆ°ç€è‰²å™¨çš„ ``fragment()`` å‡½æ•°ä¸­ã€‚

.. rst-class:: classref-property
